general.identifier: This will be replaced when the learning object is submitted to the repository

title.langstring: Replace this text with the title of the learning object

catalogentry.catalog: Replace this text with the name of a catalog (e.g. "ISBN")

entry.langstring: Replace this entry with the value of the catalog entry (e.g. the ISBN number)

general.language: Enter the primary languages of this learning object, as a list (e.g. English, French)

description.langstring: Replace this text with a narrative description of the learning object

version.langstring: Replace this text with the edition of the learning object

value.langstring: Replace this text with the 'role' of the contributor, one of: Author, Publisher, Unknown, Initiator, Terminator, Validator, Editor, Graphical Designer, Technical Implementer, Content Provider, Technical Validator, Educational Validator, Script Writer, Instructional Designer

centity.vcard: Fill in the vCard data of the contributor here

date.datetime: Replace this text with the date of the contribution e.g. "2001-02-01"

centity.vcard: Fill in the vCard data of the metadata creator (i.e. yourself) <vcard>BEGIN:vCard N:LASTNAME;FIRSTNAMEEND:vCard</vcard>

date.datetime: Replace this text with today's date e.g. "2003-04-04"

technical.format: Replace this text with the technical data type of the resource, namely a mime type
technical.size: Replace this text with the size of the resource, as a number (e.g. 44268)
technical.location: Replace this text with a URL to the resource

otherplatformrequirements.langstring: Replace this text with information about other software and hardware requirements.

duration.datetime: Replace this text with the time it would take to play this resource at its intended speed, in seconds (if applicable)

value.langstring: Replace this text with the type of the resource, one of: Exercise, Simulation, Questionnaire, Diagram, Figure, Graph, Index, Slide, Table, Narrative Text, Exam, Experiment, ProblemStatement, SelfAssesment

Replace this text with the type of the resource, one of: Exercise, Simulation, Questionnaire, Diagram, Figure, Graph, Index, Slide, Table, Narrative Text, Exam, Experiment, ProblemStatement, SelfAssesment
Replace this text with the intended user role, one of: Teacher, Author, Learner, Manager
Replace this text with the intended user role, one of: Teacher, Author, Learner, Manager

Replace this text with the educational context for the resource, one of: Primary Education, Secondary Education, Higher Education, University First Cycle, University Second Cycle, University Postgrade, Technical School First Cycle, Technical School Second Cycle, Professional Formation, Continuous Formation, Vocational Training

Replace this text with the educational context for the resource, one of: Primary Education, Secondary Education, Higher Education, University First Cycle, University Second Cycle, University Postgrade, Technical School First Cycle, Technical School Second Cycle, Professional Formation, Continuous Formation, Vocational Training

typicalagerange.langstring: Replace this text with a description of the age of the typical intended user (e.g "children under 7", "adult only")

educational.language: Replace this text with the intended user's natural language

value.langstring: Replace this text with either "yes" or "no" indicating whether use of the resource requires payment
Replace this text with either "yes" or "no" indicating whether copyright or other restrictions apply

description.langstring: Replace this text with comments on the conditions of use of the resource

value.langstring: Replace this text with one of: IsPartOf, HasPart, IsVersionOf, HasVersion, IsFormatOf, HasFormat, References, IsReferencedBy, IsBasedOn, IsBasisFor, Requires, IsRequiredBy

resource.identifier: This will be replaced when the learning object is submitted to the repository

catalogentry.catalog: Replace this text with the name of a catalog (e.g. "ISBN")

entry.langstring: Replace this entry with the value of the catalog entry (e.g. the ISBN number)

value.langstring: Replace this text with one of: Discipline, Idea, Prerequisite, Educational Objective, Accessibility Restrictions, Educational Level, Skill Level, Security Level

source.langstring: Replace this text with the name of a recognized taxonomy e.g. ACM, MESH...

taxon.id: Replace this text with the taxon's identifier in taxonomic system

entry.langstring: Replace this text with the taxon's name or label (other than identifier)

keyword.langstring: Replace this text with a keyword description of learning objective relative to its stated purpose
